“I’d like all of you to do an experiment today.”

Almost immediately the class groans at the thought of another experimental disaster.

“Now now, Ms. Bell responds defensively, “I know things didn’t turn out well last time, but this will be different, I swear it! I’ve taken extra precautions to make sure there will be no broken vials, hazardous fumes, accidental ingestions, or any other misfortunes. For this experiment, you’ll be dealing with hormones and pheromones. The pheromones you’ll be working with today are found naturally within both neko and neera bodies alike, with the exception of magnadol, which is an artificially created pheromone.

You will be expected to drop certain chemicals into each type of pheromone and write descriptions detailing the resulting reactions and why they reacted in these ways. You may work in groups of at most four or if you’d like to, work on them individually. If you have any questions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to ask.”

As the rest of the class moves towards the back of the room, you group up with your friends and reluctantly follow.

“This is gonna suck...” you moan as you gather your notes and leap onto Rina’s hand.

“Maybe this is one of those rare classes where nothing goes wrong?” April asks hopefully.

“April, I’d really like to believe that but think about our chances. There’s only been 4 times this semester we’ve had nothing go wrong. And it’s only been 2 months since school started!” Rose states hopelessly.

Rina grabs her notebook as well as you. “Let’s just get the experiment done quickly. If we finish up sooner we can all head back to our seats and out of the way of any incident.”

You all agree to try to finish your experiment as fast as possible in order to prevent any of you from getting in the blast zone of any possible accident.

“Alright, let’s get started. April, can you hand me those vials?”

“Sure thing.”

Your group goes through the first set of vials at a nice pace. Nothing appears to be broken or on the verge of exploding yet so a silent optimism is beginning to grow in you as you and Rina write down details of the latest reaction. Time passes and your group is moving onto the last vial. Maybe this really was one of those rare biology classes where nothing goes wrong?

“Ok, last one is magnadol. I think we’re in the clear.” Rose announces with some pride. Unfortunately, she couldn’t be anymore wrong.

“Ahhh....AAACHOOOO!”

As Rose is just about to mix the chemical with magnadol, her nose twitches and sneezes violently, sending the pheromones flying out of its vial. The magnadol splatters straight onto herself as well as Rina and April but not a single drop lands on you. Your friends sputter a bit and try to wipe off the chemicals from their faces.

“Of course something like that happens at the last minute! Damnit!” Rose mutters angrily.

“This stuff smells kinda funny. Almost kinda...nice.” April muses with a deep sniff.

Ms. Bell turns her head from assisting a student with worry-some eyes and rushes towards you. “Is everything alright? I heard glass shattering!”

“Uhh, well, we kinda spilled one of the chemicals onto ourselves...”

“All of you wash yourselves, quickly!” she yells as she urges the girls towards one of the nearest lab sinks. A few minutes later and Ms. Bell and your friends rejoin you back at your lab station.

“Well, you three don’t seem to be displaying any symptoms at the moment. Still, it’s possible that these are merely delayed and may show up sooner or later.”

“You said there would be symptoms right? What kind of symptoms are we talking about?” you ask.

Ms. Bell looks around the lab cautiously, as if wanting to make sure there’s no one around to eavesdrop. “Ahh...well...the symptoms of having magnadol in the body include having an increased heart rate, energy, focus, and sensitivity.”

This was partially the truth. What she left out was that magnadol was specifically designed for those wanting to indulge in the pleasures of the flesh. Magnadol greatly increases the sexual appetites of takers as well as a sharp loss of self control. These effects can last from 8 hours to as long as 24 hours. Ms. Bell originally had gotten it as a way to spice up her romantic life years ago but found the effects to be overwhelming for both her and her boyfriend.

“That’s it? That doesn’t seem too bad.”

“No, but just try drinking lots of water to flush out any possible agents. You can never be too careful.” Ms. Bell informs the girls, albeit with a nervous chuckle.

After a few more words from Ms. Bell about lab safety, you and your friends return back to your seats.

“Phew, gotta say I’m a bit relieved. For a moment I thought we’d have to go to the hospital or something.” Rose says with relief.

“I thought we’d be foaming at the mouth or worse! But if anything we’ll just be more energetic.” April responds as she stretches her arms behind her head.

John picked up the pace a bit, this would be a good chance to get inside. As he got closer, John heard the conversation.

"I'm so happy you can be here for my birthday Aunt Carol." Deanna said with glee.

"Of course honey. Thanks for letting me stay here for a little while. I promise I won't be a burden." The woman responded.

"Carol don't worry about it. You are welcome to stay as long as you need. You're family. And fuck Allen. Don't worry, things will work out." Trisha said.

Suddenly John remembered Aunt Carol. She was a woman he hadn't seen in years, something about running off with an actor who was about to hit his break. From what he was hearing, the guy left her, and so she was staying here for a while. This would be interesting.

At his current position, John was around thirty normal feet behind them. They had no idea he was there, which was good, John wanted to stay hidden for as long as humanly possible. Everything was going very much according to plan.

The garage was large, room for three cars, but only two were in here, and there were two more outside. Looking up, John saw a problem, causing him to slow down. The door was closing, and he was way to far to have a hope of making it. Damn.

Walking upto the door, John sat down and caught his breath, taking a puff from his inhaler and getting some water. John sat out of the direct path of the door a few inches to the side.

Soon enough though
1421112112.title: Aunt Carol

142111212.content:
John in his life had been a good, well coordinated athlete. He could tiptoe on the sideline like nobody else. He also rarely failed in his objectives. So suffice to say, upon tripping, John became quite embarrassed. Looking up, he realized quickly that was the second to last thing he would ever feel.

CRUNCH

The next day, Marylin, Christina, Alice, Nicole, Brenda, Tanya, Madison and Sara walked through the gate to Deanna's house to celebrate her party. Walking in last Alice noticed a small bike and a red splotch on the ground. She looked at it and tried to imagine what happened. After a minute, she had nothing and moved on.

Later in the party, Deanna notices John isn't here. She begins to well up. How could he not come? He had been at all 18 of her parties, since they were kids. Why miss this one?

"It's alright D, John probably has a good reason not to be here." Nicole consoled her.

"I mean he is like the most honest guy ever. Did he say anything about rsvping?" Christina asked.

"No, but I thought he'd surprise me."

"Well we can't dwell on the past honey. John's not here, to bad. We are. Now lets celebrate." Said Marilyn as she started to chug her punch with Sara. Christina and Tanya began to play basketball on her playstation, Alice started bringing in all the food she had made, Brenda and Madison were putting the finishing touches on the Grav bong. Deanna turned to Nicole.

"Come on. John will show up. He'll surprise us yet." She said.

"Yeah!" And the girls had a night. Kiss and tell, Drinking games, sing alongs, drunken singalongs, passing around some pot, Truth or dare with some raunchy results including a new Tanya and Christina relationship sure to rock the ages, and more that nobody remembered. Alice (the sober one) refused to tell anyone what happened.

"I can't think back to those events, they hurt my sides from all the laughter just thinking about them."

Deanna frowned. No John though. She would give him a piece of her mind later for sure.

She never got that chance

FIN

Thus ends the Heroic tale of John Woods. Died like an idiot. He will not be remebered, and will not be missed.

Two more fresh options below. Thanks again to Tex for making this Awesome Idea. Without him, I'd have never been able to pt this idea up.
142111212.title: Trips (DEATH)

choices: Sara- A former bully for the group
April- Deannas Drunk of a Sister.
14211122.content:
John sees somebody open the gate, their face is blocked by the rail. But looking at himself, John realizes he sticks out bad; a black sweatshirt on white grey concrete and white marble looks noticeable, and he is sure to draw attention. He starts to run. A moment later he hears the gate close. John turns once more to see a girl walking towards the house.

To John's suprise he learns that _____ is walking towards the house.
14211122.title: Someone is opening the gate.

142111221.content:
Surprise might have been the wrong word. Horrific Dismay, maybe. Abhorrent Terror, was another apt one.

Coming his way was a titaness in a red shirt and black slacks, black shoes. John could see her face, and it gave him bad memories. Coming his way was Sara Aronov.

Sara, like Deanna, Marilyn and John himself, was 19. Difference was she went to the private school, some fancy place. And maybe it was better than the public university; but more likely it was to show off her absorbatant wealth, Sara was from a jewish family, and she embodied what a Jewish American Princess was. Spoiled to the core, Materialistic and a manipulative little bitch. She had always had a thing against Deanna and Marilyn, She disliked how Deanna had just as much privilege as she did, and Marilyn for some petty reason.

Remembering back to a time in Senior year, Sara had twisted peoples opinions against you; you were working with dad on the farm, but slipped and fell into a pile of manure. Somehow there was a picture of that leaked and that hurt others perception of you, part of the reason why Shannon flat left you for prom.(That and she had picked up into the third wave of feminism big time)

There was also the fact that she had made Deanna's life a living hell in all four years; tripping her in the halls, locking her in a locker, and one time she and a few friends (you later found out one of them was Shannon, but you only learned that after graduation). She was borderline a racist to Alexa, she made unyielding insults towards Nicole when she was actually struggling with anorexia.

She was also a bitch to you directly. During her Sweet 16 (Yes, after her Bat Mitzvah, she had gotten to hold a sweet 16 too) she invited you, only to have you be barred entrance to the party itself. When she came by, she said she would let you in, only if you kissed her foot- "Someone like you living in the dirt should have no issue kissing the dirt off the toes of someone better than you." Needless to say you left her waiting. In the back of your mind, you had a thought- If you remembered that, there was a chance she would too... And it made you cringe.

As she made her way down the driveway, the thunderous noise of her foot falls grew louder and closer, you had to make a choice; Run, and hope she missed you with her Black Converse. Or you could sit still and hope you drew no attention. It would be impossible to get get your rope out and get get into the grass, it would just take far to long.
142111221.title: Sara- A former bully for the group

choices: They pass by... Breath a sigh of relief
1421112212.content:
John sat as close to the wall as he possibly could and closed his eyes. This situation was arguably the scariest one, because he never expected it. He could not bear to watch if Sara found him or not. His heart was beating a mile a minute.

"Please God. Please keep me safe!" He prayed to himself. The thunder of Saras steps came closer and closer until...
1421112212.title: Blend in!

choices: Have you ever been a pizza?
14211122121.content:
(Sara's POV)
Whoever the fuck made shopping for clothes and shoes so expensive can rot in hell. The fact that I have to actually work for my own money is such bullshit. My parents told me I had to get a job to 'learn how to provide for myself" or some shit like that, like whatever. Some Idiot will marry me and then I'll just take his money.

Delivering pizzas is the easiest thing I could think of, little work, drive around. And a pretty girl like me makes all the tips. It's been a short day, and it's finally about to be over: thank god. After this, I can go home and- Wait what is that?

Down on the ground, there is a small looking bug thing. I stop and really look at it. And I can not believe what I see. Looking back up at me is the diminutive form of that dumb farmer-boy hick John Woods. I have to contain myself from screaming, but the smile on my face and the look of terror on his face both match my sentiments on the situation; priceless.

"Hey there John. Long time no see." I squat down, and reach for him, slowly, as to make him understand he is doomed, there is no escape. Upon wrapping my fingers around him, I once more have to stop myself from laughing aloud. I have to deliver this Pizza, and then I have John all to myself.

Bringing him up close to get a good look at him, I see that yes this is John. He is crying, Oh i love this!

"So John." I start
14211122121.title: Found you!

1422.content:
Alright then, Four Young Women coming right up! (I'll give the descriptions for these characters in the upcoming chapters. If you go back you will find that these will be the same characters in the next level up. Also, sorry this is a one choice chapter :/ What're ya gonna do?)

Deanna- 19- 5'8/135 (34 C) (Size 9)- The Host for our event. Deanna (Or as she prefers to be called D) is a bookworm if ever there was one. She is a year ahead in school, registering as a Junior in what is normally her Sophomore year. She has never been good with boys, but not for a lack of trying, she is just shy and nervous easily. D enjoys to be pampered a little more than most people do, but its to be expected of a girl who is working to inherit a massive fortune from her family some day. She does however, appreciate honesty above all else in friends. She has known John practically her whole life, since kindergarten. They used to play together all the time, though they drifted, however they always made a serious effort to stay friends.

Marylin- 19- 5'9/ 140 (39D) (Size 9)- Marylin is a typical 'prep' She is snooty, only really enjoying people who she considers to be in her echelon of class. She loves to be in control, as such she is the one who organized this get together. She brought with her her favorite slippers, which she has had since she was a freshman in college. When asked why she doesn't get a new pair, she simply rolls her eyes. She has known John for a long time and always looked at him, not as a friend, but more of a bodyguard, something she always appreciated even if she didn't always say it.

Christina- 18- 6'0/ 175 (32B) (size 11.5)- Christina is the youngest of the clique. She is however the most different. Christina is an excellent athlete, she could probably beat the other girls one hand tied behind her back. She is however a deeper person than that. Christina enjoys a good book, a quiet corner and strong coffee, and as such she is much smarter than one might imagine. Christina is also the most free spirited, and as such despite being younger than the rest, she has had the most sexual partners, more than Marylin, Alice or Nicole. Christina is very close to John, when he was a senior and she a sophomore, he captained the Football, Wrestling, Rugby and Lacrosse, while she captained Soccer, Basketball, Softball and Lacrosse. They have a serious competitive streak, and sometimes this leads to fights that are on the borderline of serious. But at the end of the day, they are friends.

Nicole- 19- 5'9/ 165 (29B) (Size 8)- Nicole is the star of the group, or so she would have you believe. She is an actress, a good one to boot. When they were in High School, she was lead in every single production. She didn't go to school, instead opting to go to Broadway. John ribbs her every once in awhile, saying she is a starving actress, something Nicole doesn't disagree with. She misses her friends a lot and was happy to make it for a reunion. She has a severe crush on John, something she has learnt to hide well over the last ten years. Also Nicole loves to take care of her feet; she lives to get a foot massage, a pedicure- if you can touch her feet that night, she'll melt in your hands.

John- 19- 5'11/ 225- John is a simple guy. He, Deanna and Marylin are all at the same school. However John is alone there; Marylin refused to associate herself with him, and Deanna was always busy. Christina was always in season for one sport or another, Alice was usually busy being her and Nicole had been busy being a starving actress. So in school he picked up sports, and studied hard. He was working on mechanical engineering, but his roommate had been a bio major. One day he came back with a funny looking lamp; It was funny looking because as John had been told, this was a shrink lamp. Turn it on look at the light and *viola* you are one to two inches tall depending upon a bunch of biological factors. John had managed to sneak it from his roommate after the fool Threw everything away for some girl. John was told a lot of things, all of which he wrote down to remember for future use. Today is the day he had been practicing for. Its the first day of break, and John is upset he wasn't invited to the Sleepover, so now he is taking upon himself to go and hang with his friends, weather they know it or not.
But about John, He is a big guy. A stud Athlete, He was running back in football, Attack in Lacrosse, a four time state champ in wrestling and the fly half in Rugby (Number 10, his favorite in all sports) John is cut up. So whats wrong? Well, John is poor. His parents struggle for their mortgage. Johns Dad Brendan is farmer, his mom a dental secretary. They are however proud of their son, they only wish he would take risks every now and then.
Well Today is that Day. A sip or two of liquid courage to help him, he grabbed his bags, turned the lamp on, and shrank down. A short walk later, John was at the gates, a smile beaming on his face. Tonight would be fun.

choices: Starting now! Without you? How dare they?!
14221.content:
John has packed a few things into a backpack. Thinking about it, he chuckles to himself.

"I have no idea how I am going to get back here." Thinking about this, this was actually a serious problem. This lamp was the only way for you to get back to size. But then again, it was like dad said. Taking a risk is the only way to truly live. Otherwise he would never have meet Johns mother. John shook off the risk. And besides, these were his friends. They knew John like a book, cover to cover. He remembered all the times they had been together ...

When they were in 5th grade and he told Marylin he liked her and she had laughed him off. And again in 7th grade. And a third in Junior year. But each time she would apologize, and each time they would reassure they were and always had been friends. Then John asked about what about the future, to which Marylin replied that would depend upon if he was ever going to ask her out again.

In 7th grade he knocked out Dave Farrington for harassing Alice, for which he was rewarded with a kiss, a moment which Alice later joked drove her to join the human extinction project. She also rewarded him with a cake, which you appreciated after tearing your achilles that football season. (But what was important in that situation was that you scored the game winning touchdown, running the last 7 years on a bum leg.)

8th grade when a very young and very short Christina who had yet to hit puberty asked John to help her with her conditioning. Back then if you had told Christina she would spring up to six foot, and wind up with the body of an olympian with talent to match, in not two, not three but four sports, she would have no other option but to have her mind positively blown.

Senior year when Shannon Jackson bailed on him for prom, and instead John took two of his best friends who weren't even planning on going, Deanna and Nicole. They danced all night, even being voted both best and worst dancers of the night on two separate election by the rest of the class. Upon winning Prom King (Something that shocked a lot of other guys at the time, but absolutely every girl in your class of 700 had a unanimous opinion on) John refused to go up unless Deanna and Nicole were allowed up too. The queen elect; one Marylin (Because how could she not?) was all for it. And even to this day, that was the picture of the group chat. (Albeit with pictures of Christina and Alice cropped in, as Alice had elected not to go, and Christina was busy at a Soccer tournament.)

John shook of the fear. You knew these girls, and when they found you in your current situation, they would help you. So John packed. extra clothes, provisions, 90 feet of bungee rope with some grapple hooks (to help you get up if you needed to) , some medicine, a blanket, an emergency inhaler with several extra cans (just in case you failed to draw attention after a few days), a hatchet and your bike, which you were going to ride there and stash away.

John also took an envelope. the plan was that when they would catch him and ask "Where was my invitation?" After all, it was Deanna's Birthday, and she deserved all of her friends there.

Dad and mom were gone for the weekend, so bringing the lamp and his bag, John opened up his garage door around a foot give or take, he plugged the lamp into a wall outlet. it was one of those lamps you see in the pixar logo, where you can turn it. The design was that one switch turned the lamp on to be a lamp, and another switch turned on the feature of the lamp, shrinking you. You shrank your bike first. Tapping the switch, a green grid sprang out and covered the bike, slowly it became smaller and smaller, stopping at what John called natural resize point. Things he touched were around an inch when he was shrunken, as he tested with some books, they felt the same size in his hands at one inch as they did when he stood seventy two inches.

Finally he prepared himself. This would be the 5th time he had shank himself. the first was when his roommate let him use it to go spy on the girls across the hall. The second through fourth had been testing the lamp and preparing for his adventure. There was a lot of free time when you were unable to find a job, and dad all but flat out refused to let him work on the farm for another summer.

He flicked it on and felt the grid encompass him, and start to pull on him.

It pulled him into himself, until it stopped him at approximately one inch tall. He got on his bike and started the ride down his long driveway. The ride wouldn't take more than forty-five minutes to an hour at the most. As John turned down the hill he sighed in awe of his surroundings. Looking around at this size was something he would never get used to. It gave old things a new spin. He had stayed around half a day in his house navigating avoiding detection from his mom and her book club. Another he had made his way to his old tree fort and took a look out across his pastures. He saw then what he saw when he was a kid, An expansive and never ending world for him to explore. And a third he had spent testing his resistances to things like heat and cold and his metabolisms change at this size. Which he found to be a bit quicker, but nothing like he had thought it would be. in his practices, he had found that the normal rules that should have applied didn't effect him. There was no weight issue be it being to dense or to light, no rapid loss of heat nor rapid freezing nor an issue with the size of the oxygen in his lungs. But whatever, that would be more fun for him, less problems to worry about.

As he arrived at Deanna's house John gazed upon it. Unlike his families small one floor house, Deanna (Along with most of the girls) lived in rather large houses, their families being rather wealthy on average. Deannas had a gate, which is where he stopped for a minute. He pulled out the copy of the party invitations.

"Fuck!" John exclaimed. He had mad a terrible mistake. The party was...

(Author notes- I know this is backstory, and the same across all three options I am a free member so I don't get to add third options all that often but its just to explain that these are good friends, and John is a simple man and has practiced a bit for this; because lets be honest if you had a shrink ray and had a sleepover to crash, you'd want to be prepared and know your limits. I would anyway. Thank you for slogging through it, hope it was bearable at the very least. Also thanks to Tex for letting me add onto his story. Now for what we all came here for, GIANTESS CONTENT!)
14221.title: Continue...

142312121.content:
"P-plans?" You ask.

"Yeah. I'm going back home now. We can talk about this when we get back." Madison's hand lowers to her jean pocket and deposits you inside. As you land you smell an exorbitant amount of bud,and reaching out, you feel a small amount of weed.

It's hard to know how much time passes, but it has to be a fair amount. Your nerves are calmed a bit from before, Madison is going to help you though, or at the very least isn't going to be hurting you, selling you to some random girl. Again, this is what you hope at the very least; hopefully Madison's drug riddled brain doesn't forget.

After some amount of time, you are pulled out and deposited onto Madisons bed. Looking around, Madison lives in the same amount of squalor you imagine she would. Her room was a box, her bed in the corner, a desk next to it and a few drawers on the other side. Ahead of the bed was a closet and a mounted television. Posters were everywhere and just as far everywhere were clothes, shoes, bags and other materials. In a twist however, Madison's room smelled nothing of weed. How she did this was a mystery, one you wanted to figure out.

Madison had placed you near the middle of her bed, She herself was sitting down at a chair next to her desk taking off her uggs. You started to take a few steps back though; Madison had worn these for years, rain, shine, sun snow, summer through winter, almost every day. And they REEKED; a mix of sweat, weed, and a dozen other smells that all concocted to make an abomination of the most unimaginable kind; the one that you imagined Tim was having nightmares over, If his new girl hadn't given him something new to be afraid of.

As her soles slipped out of her Uggs, you got a good look at the soft smooth soles. The one time you had been with Madison after the incident, you had noticed she had nice feet. She wore size eights, and they were nice and wide, her toes long and nice. Very few wrinkles, and a she was flat footed. You imagined if she stood on you, you would be covered entirely with nowhere to go. Looking at her feet, she had her nails pained, a nice shade of deep green; like the kind you would associate with Marijuana.

The smell hit you like a truck. So hard that you in fact fell to your ass, covering your nose trying to find clean air. Madison laughed.

"Sorry John, I know they stink. I'll wash them later. I don't know what it is; I wash them all the time. Wonder how I can keep them from stinking." She giggled at you. She put her feet on her bed, one on either side of you, trapping you with the smell. Oh god, in all the tests you had ran, you had never thought to test your senses, and it was paying off dividends now. As you gathered your thoughts, and prepared to probably lose your sense of smell, you brought yourself to your feet.

"So look John, The plans I have for you, their pretty simple. I've had a long week, and I've been really alone. I know you and me bond really well, and I know why we can't date, Really I get it. ANd with that, I appreciate you being friends with me through all of that, It means a lot; maybe one day if you manage to get back to normal size we can work something out. We would look really cute together me and you." Madison moved her feet so that you were cupped between them. you had gotten over the smell, and were listening to what your titaness friend had to say.

"Anyway John, I remember that night. I have no regrets about it; you saved my ass and I owed you, and, lets be real here; you are a hottie and I kinda wanted to. But I remember that night and couldn't help but notice you noticing me. Especially...

14231222.content:
The dark ebony skin wraps tightly around you as you let a scream of sudden pain escape your lips. They don't feel broken, but they don't feel good either.

"Its Tyana. Did you really forget me John? All those records you have and there was no way I couldn't recognize that face. Although to be fair, it is a bit hard to see you" She puts her fist containing you closer to her eye. "You know given your current predicament."

You remember Tyana well; 6'1 and 190 pounds of muscle, complimented by some pretty respectable breasts and held up by size twelve shoes. Tyana Evans. She and Christina, despite a rivalry that is deep like the marianas trench, are the powerhouse driving your high school girls teams. In Basketball, almost every shot is a block. And while Christina rules the roost in Soccer, Lacrosse and Softball, Tyana is the queen for Basketball (She is the team captain, something Christina resents... If only she could get back at him somehow?) Volleyball, Track and FIeld and as a superb wrestler. Tyana and CHristina are the same age, and the two years you spent as a wrestler with her, she was tremendously talented, learning fast and absolutely crushing a vast majority of the guys on your team. (She had stopped wrestling girls only upon realizing most guys were... and still are to an extent, afraid of her. Including you in your current situation.

"Tyana. How are you? Long time no see." You try and be nice. One- because your mother would kick your ass if she ever found out you failed to use your manners, and two- Maybe this will diffuse the situation, i.e listening her galvanized grip.

"I'm fine. Now tell me, why are you so small?"

Tyana absolutely hates, hates, hates! Christina, and you are wary to expose the power of your lamp, so you make it up.

"I was out camping with some friends from school, they dropped me off around the bend and when I was walking, I looked up to see a flash of Blue hit me. I wound up like this."

Tyana's grip relaxes and you slip down. Your death will be quick, you say to yourself. But you are saved by a hand awaiting your arrival. Tyanas hand.

"Jesus, are you ok?" she asks. Despite being an intimidating force (the football and girls rugby coach kick themselves they couldn't get Tyana to join their teams.) Tyana is caring. You recall when she botched a move and hurt one of the smaller guys on the team, at the time she was working at around 140 pounds at the time, but the way she wrestled, she threw guys who were around your size like a sack of potatoes. She was powerful, but by no stretch mean.

"I'll be ok. Thank you for helping me Tyana."

"Of course. Should I take you home?" she asked.

"No, nobody is home in my house. And my mom would lose her mind if you came over, its a wreck!" you joke. Kinda; your mom would kill you at this size- the house is a wreck. You're pulled out of your thoughts by the thunderous laughter of Tyana. At this distance it's absolutely deafening, and you cover your ears.

"I guess that's fair." She replies.

"But hey, This is Deanna Marchese's house here, I'm really good friends with her."

"This is Deanna's house?" she asks for confirmation.

"Yeah."

Tyana looks back at you with a smile.

What does she say?

You are in a hotel somewhere in Florida for a convention and on the second to the top floor as you walk into an elevator. Inside the elevator, there is a woman who hasn't noticed you. From the looks of it, she's a businesswoman from the way she's dressed and has short blood red hair. She's too busy texting on her cell phone to pay you any heed as you enter the elevator. It is a transparent glass elevator that gives you a good view of the city as you go down two more floors and the elevator stops and clicks. In walk in two more women. The first is a blonde-haired Japanese woman who looks to be very pregnant and the second is a dark-skinned biker chick with long black hair reaching down to her rear, a blue jacket and leather pants. Neither of them pays you any heed as the elevator closes and begins to go down.

You let out a yawn and then you look at the three women in the elevator with you. It was one of those awkward elevator moments given that you were the only guy, especially seeing as one of the elevator goers was heavily pregnant. You let out a sigh and then you squint because for some reason, these women seem taller to you. "Huh?" you ask yourself. You rub your eyes and then you gasp. All three of these women, the businesswoman, the biker girl and the pregnant woman, all were now two heads taller than you and seem to be getting bigger. It was there you look down and then you gasp in shock as you realize the truth. The businesswoman, pregnant woman and biker aren't getting bigger, you're getting smaller. You were shrinking at a rapid rate and you had no idea why.

As you're almost shrunken to 2 feet tall, another change happens. All three of the women in the elevator with you appear to be suddenly gaining weight and expanding. Their bellies extend out until they touch their knees as they each grow a triple chin and their arms and legs bloat up, to say nothing of their growing behinds, the biker's cause her jeans to start coming apart while the businesswoman's behind pushes you into the glass and you grunt right before you continue to shrink. By the time you've stopped shrinking, you're only a millimeter high. You let out a high pitched scream and see you are now the size of a bug in an elevator with three massively obese giant women. To your surprise, the pregnant woman, the biker girl and the businesswoman don't pay their sudden weight gain any mind, the biker even taps her large stomach out of boredom.

You then look at the glass elevator to see that it was getting closer to the ground and you're in utter surprise. It wasn't just the three women riding the elevator with you who had expanded. Every woman down in town had become very fat and huge and from the looks of it, every man had shrunken just like you. But surprisingly, that wasn't even the weirdest part, for all the massive fat ladies down below had also turned into monsters and supernatural beings of mythology.

From up in the elevator you saw obese monster women who were giants to the shrunken human men. There was an obese skateboarding werewolf girl with ginger brown fur and hair worn in a ponytail, dressed in purple and yellow. She was so large that this werewolf girl was using two skateboards to roll down the street. There was a female mail carrier who had mutated into a massive and obese unicorn with the stripes of an okapi. As she bent over to put the mail she was carrying into a mailbox, her pants slipped, revealing her enormous striped behind covered in polka dot panties. As the fat unicorn mail lady put away her mail, a massively tall and obese policewoman passed by. This policewoman was a bright gold-colored manticore with two large bat-like wings and a fat scorpion's tail. She was carrying a cage that had several shrunken convicts inside. All these obese monster women acted as if it was natural for them to be fat supernatural creatures coexisting with millimeter high men.

You then turn and see that the three (now colossal and obese) women you shared an elevator with were turning into monsters as well. First, the businesswoman grew white and brown fur all over her body as her face extended into a snout, her ears grew longer and she sprouted a pair of long crescent-shaped horns at the side of her head. Her feet slipped out of her shoes and revealed to have turned into hooves and then she sprouted a tail as her skirt tore apart and an udder grew between her legs. The businesswoman had transformed into an obese female minotaur.

Then you turn your attention to the obese biker lady as she scratched her large behind. You see that her skin has turned a bright reddish purple shade and her fingers turn into sharp claws as her ears grow longer and she suddenly sprouts a long lizard-like tail. You then hear a ripping sound and step back to look past the biker girl's enormous butt and up at her back where two holes appear in her jacket and a pair of large leathery bat-like wings sprout. The wings are so big that it looks like even weighing half a ton, the biker girl could still fly. You then look and see her feet sprout bird-like talons that shred her boots to pieces. The big fat biker chick had transformed into a gargoyle before your eyes.

You finally turn your attention to the fat and pregnant Japanese lady and you see her eyes become curved as she yawned and her nose extended into a snout and her face turned into that of a tapir. She grew rounder as her upper body turned bright hot pink and her lower body turned a yellow-orange color with leopard-like spots and her feet turned into the flat feet of an ungulate. She now looked like an obese and pregnant anthropomorphic tapir. The pregnant woman had transformed into a baku, a tapir-like monster of Japanese mythology said to eat dreams.

You look up and see that even though you were only a millimeter high, all three massively obese monster woman looked more colossal than just that. You'd say each giant fat lady, the pregnant baku, the gargoyle biker and minotaur businesswoman was now 10 feet tall. You were a millimeter high in the same elevator as three 10ft high female monster fatties. It was at that moment...

The elevator reached the ground floor and clicked. With it, the skyscraper-sized fat ladies walk out; the pregnant baku, the minotaur businesswoman and the gargoyle biker chick. You run out of the elevator and see that the hotel lobby is filled with shrunken men and women who had transmogrified into obese supernatural monsters. As you are pondering the situation, you see a shadow coming across and see an obese teenaged kappa giantess walking forward while listening to her headphones. Not walking to get stepped on, you run as fast as a millimeter high young man could as the flabby webbed feet of the kappa titaness come forward. She steps out looking for you and you see your girlfriend has mutated into a huge and obese....
